main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Hyattsville, Maryland on 12 June 1954.
interesting points: The sighting was recorded as a ground-radar and air-visual observation., The object was observed for a duration of 45 minutes., The observation reported only elevation with no specific estimate provided., The case was likely categorized as an astro body (such as a star or planet)., The sighting was in the vicinity of Andrews AFB, with a noted lack of available analysis from other military and civilian aircraft in the area.
sighted object: one large light, oval or round, bluish-green
witness description: individual sitting on the porch stargazing
